Name: Sid
Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Good one
Description: Worth use for veggies to cook. Easy to use. Stylish in look. Light in weight

Name: Amazing perfect taste
Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Amazing
Description: 1. Very good looking 2. Ease on handling 3. Ease on use 4. Perfect for 2 to 3 person 5. Quick heating6. Healthy cooking with less oil 7. Best for Maggi, Coffee, Oats Porridge, Oats Khichadi, Soyabin Rice, Pasta, noodles, egg boiling, egg omelette etc. 8. Ease of Cleaning 9. Good functioningDislike 1. Small Chord 2. Nonstick inner Coating not so  good and removed away partly after a few weeks

Name: Tammy
Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Versatile, efficient, and perfect for all your travel needs!
Description: I recently purchased this multipurpose kettle and it has exceeded my expectations. The build quality is solid, and it’s easy to clean. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a versatile and efficient appliance!

Name: Saraswati
Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Small and sweet instacuppa.
Description: Very nice and handy. Only drawback is the cord is very short and has 2 way. Cannot be used for 3 way. Please increase the cord length a little and make it adjustable for 3 way socket.

Name: Gayatri Sahoo
Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Must needed product in home
Description: I have been  using the Insta Cuppa Non-Stick Multi Cooking Pot/Kettle for a few weeks now, and I'm thoroughly impressed! It's incredibly versatile, allowing me to boil water, cook noodles, and even make soups effortlessly. The non-stick surface is a game-changer; cleaning up is a breeze with no stubborn food residues left behind. The design is sleek and modern, fitting perfectly in my kitchen without taking up much space. Plus, the build quality feels robust and durable. Overall, it's exceeded my expectations and has become an essential part of my daily cooking routine. Highly recommended!"

Name: Ramchandra
Title:
3.0 out of 5 stars
Very short Two pin Power cable
Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                



Ordered this for travel cooking ( in the train/ car etc.) it's very light weight so it can be easily carried out.Used it for the first time today.The power cable needs a bit of wiggling to get power on the wall socket end. ( 2 pin tops are notoriously known for loose connections)Only half hemisphere heat is coming. Took 7 minutes for 1 cup water to come to a rolling boil, didn't auto shutdown.Build is nice, the lid and handle feel good.Aesthetics are nice, the coffee mug type handle is the cherry on top.Since it's not performing as expected I'm ordering a replacement, will update post replacement.

Name: Moideen
Title:
5.0 out of 5 stars
Excellent product. Value for money guaranteed
Description: Very useful for bachelor staying alone.

Name: Ashok
Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Convenient, but could be better
Description: The electric Kettle is ideal for a single person to cook a fuss free quick meal and is an ideal companion on the road.  My grouse is with the short electric cable with 2 pin. My kitchen has 3 pin electric plug points and they do not suit the 2 pin plug provided with the kettle. That's an inconvenience. Barring that, the product looks cute, small and built sturdy.

Name: Dinesh S Chawla
Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Good product for Travel
Description: We are delighted to have this product with us, during our journey. It helps us prepare food for our little one. Light weight product with good performance, auto switch off is not available. Has very minimal noise. Speed is average.3 improvements can be made:1. The cable / cord can be longer for easy access2. The heating / boiling mechanism can be evenly distributed across the bottom of the product3. The steam out hole on the lid can be a bit larger or few more holes can be attached for easy boiling of rice and other items.

Name: kumar
Title:
4.0 out of 5 stars
Good product
Description: I bought this product for my baby, so that cook food during when we are out of city. Its delivers as promised. But person has to be patient as it takes time for food to cook unlike a regular gas stove. Only one negative that I see is that you can heat milk but u cannot boil it which is necessary for babies . Waited for almost 30mins but was unable to boil milk. Anyways i would still say it's a good product as it helped us in lot of things like steaming veggies , heating water and reheating milk ...it's a good to have product during travel with babies.
